channel.title: Deathlypvp source, client wont connect :@
channel.description:
I've had servers before, but i just switched tot his source: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,556727.0.html
and in client.java i changed all the ip's to my no-ip, and hosted it on my vps just like i did with my other source, and it says "error connecting to server" the client files are arranged wierd too >.< it goes like:
Client - > javafiles - > the .java's in here Client - > javazoom -> jl, jl.jar Client - > loadandclass - > all the .class's in here
What do i use when signing it??

item.title: Deathlypvp source, client wont connect :@
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“24jared24, post:8, topic:457367”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=560296.msg4091401#msg4091401 date=1346414168]

@Dan, PI’s don’t have gui…

@Rocket, Full sentences, use them.

That’s the only incomplete sentence I’ve ever posted on this Forum. What you know about grammar couldn’t fill the palm of my hand. Your Client files look “odd”, because they’re Packaged.
[/quote]

No it’s not, i saw another post by you this morning that was three words, with a period, and no predicate. But anyways; would you like to explain what “packaged” means in this situation? Because you clearly aren’t helping yet you post in the help section.[/quote]

How am I supposed to help one who can’t help themselves? I’m helping if you can put some initiative into learning. I just thought you needed to know this, but obviously I was mistaken. I apologize for my terrible grammar…

Read full topic
